rows.name:
Toggle inversion of up/down for
camera controls.

Toggle inversion of left/right for
camera controls.

Adjust the response times for the
automatically controlled camera.

Adjust the length of time it takes to
reset the camera's position.

Adjust the tracking speed of the
auto camera.

Adjust the turning speed of the
manual camera.
Adjust the speed of the camera's zoom.
Toggle subtitles on or off.
Adjust voice volume during cutscenes.
Adjust script event volume.

Adjust background music volume
during the game.

Adjust volume of sound effects
heard during the game.

Adjust volume of voices heard during
the game.

Adjust volume of narration heard
during battle.

Adjust volume of environmental sounds
(such as rain) heard during the game.

Adjust volume of system sounds
heard during the game.
Adjust screen brightness.

Adjust the automatic behavior of the
camera when traversing gradients.
Change in-game voice settings.

You can adjust the game's difficulty
level here.
Toggle auto-battle functionality.

Toggle automatic success for button
challenge inputs during Specials.

Toggle whether foes pick a fight (exc.
salvage, unique, boss, and quest foes).

Adjust attack power, with the power
increasing to the right.

Adjust attack frequency, with the
frequency increasing to the right.

Adjust maximum HP, with the value
increasing to the right.

Adjust debuff effect duration, with the
length increasing to the right.

Adjust Blade Combo buffer time, with
the buffer increasing to the right.

Adjust magnitude of Party Gauge gains,
with the amount increasing to the right.

Adjust Special gauge gains, with the
amount increasing to the right.

Adjust party members' healing power,
with the effect increasing to the right.

Adjust damage multiplier gains, with
the amount increasing to the right.

Adjust Party Gauge depletion, with the
rate of loss increasing to the right.

When enabled, the game will save
automatically at certain points.

Toggle enemy aggression. Excludes
unique, boss, and quest enemies.

When enabled, skips Community
registration animations.

When enabled, special battle music will
play with certain Blades in the party.
